metadata.title: CVE-2020-36310 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.arch/x86/kvm/svm/svm.c allows a set_memory_region_test infinite loop forcertain nested page faults, aka CID-e72436bc3a52.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.8.0-23-generic - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-5.8.0-23-generic-lpae - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-generic - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-generic-64k - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-lowlatency - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
No subscription required
